_header: Who will behold of love the chance
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Inconstancy of Luve’ — three 8-line stanzas (aaabaaab) with the same rhymes throughout

Banna.First Lines:
Quha will behald of luve the chanceWith sueit dissauyng
                    countenance…
Banna.Last Lines:
…it war als nyss an ordinanceas quha wald bid ane deid man
                    danceIn sepulture
